mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Board (title, body, inserted) VALUES (#{title}, #{body}, #{inserted})
mapper.select: SELECT b.id id, b.title title, b.body body, b.inserted inserted, COUNT(r.id) numOfReply FROM Board b LEFT JOIN Reply r ON b.id = r.board_id WHERE b.id = #{id} GROUP BY b.id

SELECT b.id id, b.title title, b.inserted inserted, COUNT(r.id) numOfReply FROM Board b LEFT JOIN Reply r ON b.id = r.board_id WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') GROUP BY b.id ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT COUNT(id) totalCount FROM Board
WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')

SELECT b.id id, b.title title, b.inserted inserted, COUNT(r.id) numOfReply FROM Board b LEFT JOIN Reply r ON b.id = r.board_id WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') GROUP BY b.id ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{from}, #{row}
